sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù, dànshì méiyǒu shíjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux y aller, mais je n'ai pas le temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to go, but I don't have time.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件衣服的颜色很难看。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu de yánsè hěn nánkàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La couleur de ce vêtement est vraiment laide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The color of this clothes is really ugly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè chángyòng de cí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un mot couramment utilisé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a commonly used word.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhàogù shēngbìng de māma.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle prend soin de sa mère malade.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She takes care of her sick mother.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiānkōng shì lánsè de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le ciel est bleu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sky is blue.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùjiǔ tā jiù huílái le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est revenu peu après.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He came back soon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào de dàmén bā diǎn kāi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le portail de l'école ouvre à huit heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The school gate opens at eight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié shēngqì, zhè bùshì dàshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne te fâche pas, ce n'est pas grave.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't be angry, it's not a big deal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàge nǚrén hěn piàoliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette femme est très belle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That woman is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì lánqiú duì de duìyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est membre de l'équipe de basket-ball.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a member of the basketball team.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shuāng xié de dàxiǎo zhèng héshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La taille de ces chaussures est parfaite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The size of these shoes is just right.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我喜欢水果，比如说苹果和香蕉。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan shuǐguǒ, bǐrú shuō píngguǒ hé xiāngjiāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime les fruits, par exemple les pommes et les bananes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like fruits, for example apples and bananas.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà huìr wǒ hái zài shàngxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À cette époque-là, j'étais encore à l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: At that time, I was still in school.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他父亲是一个成功的商人。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fùqīn shì yī gè chénggōng de shāngrén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son père est un homme d'affaires prospère.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His father is a successful businessman.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān zěnme zhème rè?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pourquoi fait-il si chaud aujourd'hui ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Why is it so hot today?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng àn zhège jiàn kāijī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Appuyez sur ce bouton pour allumer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please press this key to turn on.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān liànxí xiě Hànzì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je pratique l'écriture des caractères chinois chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I practice writing Chinese characters every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这条路禁止大型车辆通行。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo lù jìnzhǐ dàxíng chēliàng tōngxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gros véhicules sont interdits sur cette route.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Large vehicles are prohibited on this road.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wàng dài yínháng kǎ le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai oublié d'apporter ma carte bancaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I forgot to bring my bank card.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zěnyàng cái néng xuéhǎo Zhōngwén?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Comment peut-on bien apprendre le chinois ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How can one learn Chinese well?
